item.title: Self-hosting
item.description: Current State: SaaS Currently, we’re on Render’s free tier that gives us these free web services: Custom domains Managed TLS certificates Pull request reviews Log streams Rollbacks up to the two most recent previous deploys. … with these limitations: Spins down after 15min of no inbound traffic. Spinning up on the next request causes a noticeable delay for a couple seconds. Monthly limits, which will suspend the app if exceeded: 750 instance hours.

item.title: Server Logs
item.description: The app is hosted at render.com , and Render suggests several options for logging . Better Stack ’s free tier offers 1GB/month, 3-day retention and 5 data sources. It also has an Uptime product whose free tier has free email alerts, 3-minute checks, 10 monitors, and 5 status pages. Datadog ’s pricing page starts at $0.
